title.rendered: Cowboy Channel Plus Launch “Everything We Got” Package for 2023 NFR

content.rendered:
Rodeo fans, rejoice! Cowboy Channel Plus is now offering an incredible deal that will give you access to more rodeo action than ever before. For only $119.99, you can stream over 950 live rodeo performances, including all 10 days of the 2023 Wrangler National Finals Rodeo (NFR), live from Las Vegas!

What’s Included

With the “Everything We Got” Package, you’ll get:

  • The National Finals Rodeo (NFR): The NFR is the premier rodeo event in the world, featuring the top cowboys and cowgirls from across the globe competing for the coveted gold buckle.
  • Live streaming + on-demand of all programming on The Cowboy Channel: The Cowboy Channel is your home for all things rodeo, with live coverage of major events, in-depth interviews, and behind-the-scenes stories.
  • Live streaming + on-demand of all programming on The Cowgirl Channel: The Cowgirl Channel celebrates the women of rodeo, with coverage of women’s rodeo events, profiles of female rodeo athletes, and inspiring stories of female rodeo pioneers.
  • PRCA – up to 950 different regular season ProRodeo performances: ProRodeo is the top level of professional rodeo, and you’ll get to stream up to 950 different regular season ProRodeo performances, including big, medium, and small rodeos.
  • CPRA – 28 Canadian regular season ProRodeo performances: You’ll also get to stream 28 Canadian regular season ProRodeo performances, showcasing the best rodeo talent from Canada.
  • The Canadian Finals Rodeo (CFR): The CFR is the Canadian equivalent of the NFR, and you’ll get to stream all the action live.
    Brazilian Professional Rodeos: You’ll get to stream 10 LNR-produced rodeos and bull riding events around Brazil, including the legendary Barretos rodeo.
  • National High School Finals Rodeo: The National High School Finals Rodeo is the premier high school rodeo event in the country, and you’ll get to stream all the excitement.
  • National Junior High School Finals Rodeo: The National Junior High School Finals Rodeo is the premier junior high school rodeo event in the country, and you’ll get to stream all the action.
  • Little Britches Rodeo: Little Britches Rodeo is the world’s largest youth rodeo organization, and you’ll get to stream all the action from the Little Britches Finals Rodeo.
  • Junior World Finals: The Junior World Finals is the premier rodeo event for young rodeo athletes, and you’ll get to stream all the action.
  • World’s Largest PRCA Archive on VOD: You’ll get access to the world’s largest PRCA archive on VOD, with over 100,000 hours of rodeo footage.
  • Spanish Language Feeds for the Top 10 PRCA Rodeos: You’ll get access to Spanish language feeds for the top 10 PRCA rodeos, so you can enjoy all the action in your native language.

This is an incredible offer that you won’t want to miss! Sign up for the “Everything We Got” Package today and start streaming all the rodeo action you can handle!
